42.eng-name: The Book of Hunting and Slaughtering

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Salim bin 'Abdullah that his father said:"The Messenger of Allah said: "Whoever keeps a dog, except a dog for herding livestock or a dog for hunting, one Qirat will be deducted from his reward each day." 'Abdullah said: "Abu Hurairah said: 'Or a dog for farming

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي إِمْسَاكِ الْكَلْبِ لِلْحَرْثِ
chapter.eng-name: The Concession for Keeping A Dog for Farming
